data.text:
Very very good. Clean. Friendly staff. Good breakfast. 
I wish restourant meniu is better so I would eat here offten. I wish they have ice tapas and more main course dishes for evening. 
Nice place for meatings and top swimming pool. Pool is not very big and cold at march 31 st.
data.title: Clean not noice hotel with swimming pool

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear OlgaE681,

Thank you for the great review of our hotel, our breakfast, our cleaning service and our staff! 

We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Sincerely,

Guest Experience Department
owner_response.author: Ivan Lara

data.text:
Hi, My family and I are checked in at the Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira on Saturday, March 30, 2024 around 5:30pm. We were greeted by two receptionists. We booked two rooms for our family of 5. We have three kids and my little one is 6 years old. One of the  receptionists told us that we needed another room because of our 6 years old. We were surprised with this request since this is fourth 4-star hotel in Barcelona area and no-one asked us such request before. We have been traveling around the world, stayed in many hotels, and this is only the hotel asked us to get another room because of our 6 years old.  We always pay for the room. When my husband shared his experience with that receptionist with an obvious disappointment, the same receptionist got very upset and shouted out really loud “this is not your country”. This is not a professional way of explaining the hotel policies. This is a pure discrimination, and I am very disappointed in the Leonardo Royal Hotels because of having such a rude and unprofessional staff member in the team. He treated my husband and my family very disrespectfully. We were in Spain to celebrate Easter, and this experience will be always shadowing our vacation, Easter, and  happy memories. 
Another issue is while this hotel claims that they must follow the rules, I was given a room with a very strong smoke smell. It is a shame that they chase my 6 years old age to sell me another room, but not chasing people who smoke in the room. Very disappointing…
data.title: Very disappointed…

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear MC, 

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback.

We would like to inform you that the Spanish law is extremely demanding with regard to room capacity. The rooms booked were for maximum 4 people, that is why my colleagues recommended you book another room. 

As a 4-stars hotel we are obliged to send precise lists of guests staying at the hotel to the national police for security reasons. We do apologize for the inconvenience caused but due to the strict regulations receptionists should emphasized that the hotel policies between countries are extremely different. We regret all the misunderstand caused. 

If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Thank you very much for your understanding,

Sincerely,

Guest Experience Department
owner_response.author: Ivan Lara

data.text:
Night manager was very rude and unhelpful. I expected some manners, but he was nasty to me, an american, and I witnessed him nicer to other nationalities. I asked if I could extend my room and he said no it is full without looking. I go to the website to pay for another night and the rate is available and even cheaper than what I paid before.

Love the hotel, but a little farther from downtown than I would have liked. Overall trip would have been perfect except for the man who worked the front desk at night and his unnecessary rudeness. I will never stay here again.
data.title: Lovely, but rude employees.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mikey S, 

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. While I wish you had a better experience, it is feedback like this that we learn from and use to improve. 

We are really surprised by your comment, please provide us more information at info.royalbarcelona@leonardo-hotels.com. 

We work hard to deliver an exceptional guest experience, and it's apparent in this case that we fell short. If you give us a chance to earn back your trust, I can assure you that we will do our best to give you the great hotel experience that so many of our guests have grown so fond of.

Sincerely,

Guest Experience Department
owner_response.author: Ivan Lara

data.text: Fresh off our exciting cruise adventure, the exceptional front office team of Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira awaited us in Barcelona with an unexpected gift and hearty welcome for our wedding anniversary! The stylish hotel room was cozy and immaculately clean adding to our unforgettable experience. Definitely returning here on our next vacation! Shout out to Mark, Adelina and Javier for going far and beyond! They were very friendly and helpful!
data.title: Great Experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Explore00512126600, 

Thank you for your great review of our hotel and staff! We will pass your comment on to the people mentioned.

We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again very soon.

Sincerely,

Guest Experience Department
owner_response.author: Ivan Lara

data.text: The room I received has a beautiful view of the city, very clean and modern, smells nice everywhere, especially in the lobby. The breakfast is quite varied, pleasant ambient music and very friendly staff. The hotel is located in a good area, with a metro station nearby. I really appreciate their hospitality, I definitely recommend, you can't go wrong.  🤎
data.title: Top!
